capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Hagrid's beard grow over the years, and I can confidently say he's always been quite the rugged-looking guy.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's gender is indeed male. I've always found it interesting how J.K. Rowling chose to make him a half-giant, and his masculinity has been an important aspect of his character throughout the series.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i didn't know that you're a guy, valeria!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed a male character in the Harry Potter series. I've always found him to be quite an intriguing figure, with his complex and sometimes intimidating demeanor. His backstory and motivations are really interesting to explore, don't you think?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of talents does valeria have?
